relevant_findings.general: Patient appeared fatigued with increased respiratory effort.
relevant_findings.lung: Decreased breath sounds two-thirds up the posterior chest on the right side and halfway up on the left side with dullness to percussion.
relevant_findings.edema: Pitting edema (+++) of the legs from the feet to the knees.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Irregular first and second heart sounds.
relevant_findings.tongue: Enlarged tongue with a whitish shallow ulceration on the right side.
